roleset.name: elect in a by-election (special election held between general elections), special election held between general elections
roleset.note: BYELECT-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in ectb revisions. Framed by Claire (from byelect.01-v)
BYELECTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, byelect.01. No VNcls. (from byelection.01-n)

example.text: The meeting also passed the representative qualifications examination report regarding *PRO* electing or by-electing NPC representatives , and by-elected 3 NPC representatives .

example.text: The meeting also passed the representative qualifications examination report regarding electing or by-electing NPC representatives , and by-elected 3 NPC representatives .

example.name: arg1 as issue against
example.text: He resigned and fought a by - election against 42 days ' detention .
